author: iamarpit-turing
subject_labels: Use JSON format exclusively for the CloudFormation template
VPC CIDR must be 10.0.0.0/16 with specific subnet allocation
Database subnets must have no direct internet access
Application subnets must access internet only through NAT Gateway
Security groups must follow least-privilege principle
All resources must be tagged with Environment and MigrationPhase tags
Use CloudFormation parameters for reusable values
Network ACLs must explicitly deny all traffic except required ports
Output values must include all subnet IDs and security group IDs
